methodology.description: Uses cone violation energies from hyperbolic entailment cones to identify potential annotation errors
methodology.high_energy_entailments: Entailment pairs with high cone violations may be mislabeled
methodology.low_energy_non_entailments: Neutral/contradiction pairs with low cone violations may be true entailments
